scripts.start:bun-serve: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & bun ssr/server.bun-serve.js
scripts.start:bun-http: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & bun ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start:node-http: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & node ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start:node-uws: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & node ssr/server.uws.js
scripts.start-linux:bun-serve: echo Bun.serve && bun -v && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 bun ssr/server.bun-serve.js
scripts.start-linux:bun-http: echo Bun http && bun -v && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 bun ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start-linux:node-http: echo Node http && node -v && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 node ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start-linux:node-uws: echo Node uWebSockets && node -v && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 node ssr/server.uws.js
